channel.title: Xen plant Reactions
channel.description:
I have two points to discus first being in Xen will plants react to you walking on them? Will they bend? Or will you walk trough them like in older games?
Second will some plants react in cool ways? Like will plants glow when you come close? Or tall grass spouts quickly sink back into the hole the grow out of when touched?
Also (i bit of topic) will the same thing happen with harmless animals around Xen? Such as little animals that cower if you get close and run if you get to close?
Just tying to help Xen look i little more alive and sorry if this post some how bothers some one
P.S. i have not read many posts so sorry if some one already used this topic

item.title: Xen plant Reactions
item.dc:creator: X_Mastershot_X
item.description:
taxi_evil:

Slowly drifting back on topic

I saw Avatar again yesterday for the 3rd time (I think I’m developing a mild obsession), seems like a good place to get inspiration for Xen. The quality and imagination in their plant life and creatures blows any alien world I’ve seen before completely out of the water. Hopefully Xen will seem as fresh as Pandora did, that’s what it desperately needs

BECAUSE HE SAİD SO! :fffuuu:

Read full topic

item.title: Xen plant Reactions
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
Vitriol:

There was a type of plant that had a glowing orb on a stalk that stopped glowing when you get near (the stalk may have retreated into the plant as well, but I cant remember).

There was a discussion on this years ago (before the move to Gamer Node). I personally put it down to using the orb to attract insects for food (eg Venus Fly Trap) and then ‘hiding’ when a larger animal came near (defense against predators).

I’d like to see this plant with perhaps a few insects flying around it (glowing sprites?) and maybe a few more plants with a similar behaviour make an appearance.

(rot)(fodder:

as no [COLOR=‘Lime’]p.a.n.t.s[/SIZE] were ever glowing in the original I think it is safe to say that they won’t in black mesa.

Read full topic

There was a type of plant that had a glowing orb on a stalk that stopped glowing when you get near (the stalk may have retreated into the plant as well, but I cant remember).

There was a discussion on this years ago (before the move to Gamer Node). I personally put it down to using the orb to attract insects for food (eg Venus Fly Trap) and then ‘hiding’ when a larger animal came near (defense against predators).

I’d like to see this plant with perhaps a few insects flying around it (glowing sprites?) and maybe a few more plants with a similar behaviour make an appearance.

item.title: Xen plant Reactions
item.dc:creator: Dillxn
item.description:
I’ve posted some meaningless posts on here, but that’s hardly the majority. Not quite as much, but I could say the same about some of your posts as well. I am above the majority of registered users on here in regards to my posts’ quality (albeit “quality” being subjective). But, in resolve, I’ll post less frequently if it’d appease you.
